title: His Brand of Beautiful
description: When marketing strategist Tate Newell first meets wine executive Christina Clay he has one goal in mind: tell Christina he won't design the new brand for Clay Wines. Tell her: Thanks but no thanks. So long, good night.But Tate is a sucker for a damsel in distress and when a diary mix-up leaves Christina in his debt, it's Tate who gets more than he bargained for.What does a resourceful girl do when the best marketing brain in the business won't play ball? She bluffs. She cheats. And she ups the ante. But when the stakes get too high, does anybody win?Falling in love was never part of this branding brief.
author: Lily Malone
